page.title: 15ATTITUDES OF CHILDREN PAGE 2
page.content: When they were asked about facilities in the village, again they agreed there were not enough. There are only two clubs for young people in the village and one only held on a Fridays. Kate produced a time-table for a typical school day. {7.15.}Get up. {7.30.}Have my breakfast. {8.30.}Set out for school. {9.00.}School starts. {12.00.}School finishes for morning dinner at school. {1.15. }School re-starts. {3.45. }School finishes for day go home. { {4.00 -6.30.}Recreational activities music lessons watching T.V. {6.30.}Evening meal. {7.00.}More recreational activities. {9.30.}Bed-time.
